bibl.title: Letter from Sidney Wallach to Philip Showalter Hench, August 28, 1950

div1.p: Wallach sends Hench a copy of a letter he has written to Siler at Hench's suggestion.

div1.head: Letter from Sidney Wallach to Philip Showalter Hench, August 28, 1950
div1.opener:
Sidney Wallach
28 August 1950
Dr. P. S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester,
Minnesota
Dear Dr. Hench,
div1.p:
Acting on the suggestion in your recent letter, I have
just written to Colonel Siler as per the enclosed.

I hope that I may have the opportunity of working with
you on this.
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours, Sidney Wallach SW:g
1 encl.
SIDNEY WALLACH ASSOCIATES, 381 FOURTH AVENUE, NEW YORK 16, N. Y. MUrray Hill 4-7770
